net.proteusframework.data.mail

Class FileEntityMailPart

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.mail.AbstractMailPart
      • net.proteusframework.data.mail.FileEntityMailPart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSource, net.proteusframework.core.mail.MailPart

    public class FileEntityMailPart
extends net.proteusframework.core.mail.AbstractMailPart
implements DataSource
    MailPart backed by a FileEntity.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileEntityMailPart(FileEntity fileEntity)
      Create a new instance setting the LenientContentType to the FileEntity.getContentType().

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileEntityMailPart

        public FileEntityMailPart(FileEntity fileEntity)
        Create a new instance setting the LenientContentType to the FileEntity.getContentType().
        Parameters:
        fileEntity - the file entity. Must not be deleted. Must be attached to a hibernate session or initialized so that meta data can be retrieved.
